name: Bad school
description:
Bad school is a point and click horror game , your are alex macGiver a investigator his objectif find the secret of the cursed school  in USA , the school i abandoned for many year  but  the dark story continues to remain in this school , you must remove the curse of this school to know the verity but the curse is chasing you inside the school.

System requirement

window : 10

ram : 4 GB or greater

memory card : radeon or other 

storage disk : 500GB or greater

Credits 
  • official developper : fear Studio x
  • ost : youtube and freesound.org 
  • inspired of five nights at freddy's
  • voice actor : unknow
  • beta tester : unknow
Softwares used -blender 3d : modelling, rendering, animating
-click team fusion 2.5 : game engine
-audacity : sound edit
-paint.net : photo editing
